name: Shahada
uniques: Profession of faith asserting the oneness of God and the prophethood of Muhammad

name: Salat
uniques: [+5 Faith] from every [Mosque], mandatory daily prayers performed five times a day

name: Zakat
uniques: Mandatory almsgiving, [+2 Gold, +1 Happiness] from every [Market] [in cities following this religion]

name: Sawm
uniques: Fasting during the month of Ramadan, [+1 Faith, +1 Health] from every [Granary]

name: Hajj
uniques: Pilgrimage to Mecca, [+3 Culture, +3 Faith] [in capital] when completed at least once

name: Jihad
uniques: Striving in the way of God, [+2 Strength] for units [when fighting in foreign lands]

name: Ummah
uniques: Community of believers, [+1 Happiness] from every [Courthouse] [in cities following this religion]

name: Shura
uniques: Consultative decision-making, [+1 Culture] from every [Council] [in cities following this religion]

name: Tawhid
uniques: Belief in the oneness of God, [+2 Faith] from every [Temple]

name: Quran
uniques: Holy Scripture, [+1 Culture, +1 Science] from every [Library]

name: Sunni
uniques: Largest branch of Islam, [+1 Happiness, +1 Faith] from every [Market]

name: Shi'a
uniques: Branch of Islam, [+2 Faith, -1 Happiness] from every [Barracks], special reverence for Ali
